title: Poll Workers in Atlanta Were Removed After Being Linked to Jan. 6
description: A Fulton County official said the woman “seemed to imply” in a social media post that she was going to videotape elements of her work at the polling place, which is forbidden.
dc:creator: Richard Fausset

media:content.media:credit: Jason Andrew for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Protesters outside the Capitol during the Jan. 6 riot.
